name: Defend One Room
description:
Defend One Room

Your base is under attack. There is only one room remaining. Build up towers to defend it at all costs.

  • Try to survive 20 waves of attacks.
  • The towers are free to build and remove, but don't build above your quota or else your room will take damage!
  • Control the game with the mouse.
  • Made in 20 hours for Ludum Dare 37 game jam.

Updated 4/9/2018 - Added a fast forward button, lots of balance changes, fixed bugs.
